text: prAqcIna#va(gm)SaM karOti dEvamanuqShyA diSOq vya#Bajantaq prAcI$M dEqvA da#kShiqNA piqtara#H praqtIcI$M manuqShyA# udI#cI(gm) ruqdrA yat prAqcIna#va(gm)SaM kaqrOti# dEvalOqkamEqva tad-yaja#mAna uqpAva#rtatEq pari# Srayatyaqntar.hi#tOqhi dE#valOqkO ma#nuShyalOqkA-nnAsmAllOqkAth svE#tavyamiqvEtyA#huqH kO hi tad-vEdaq yad-yaqmuShmi#~MllOqkE&sti# vAq na vEti# diqkShva#tI kAqSAn ka#rO - [  ] 1
